languages.text: {n}Шепоты вцепляются в самое болезненное воспоминание словно в оголенный нерв — дыхание перехватывает от воспоминания о {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}боли{/d}, которую вы так пытались забыть.{/n} "Твое тело поломано и ущербно, а разум кровоточит в муках. Ты сломан{mf||а}, калека. Тебе стоило сдаться еще давно. Прими смерть, избавься от страданий".

{n}The whispers sink their fangs into your most painful memory as into an exposed nerve. It knocks the air out of your lungs as you remember the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}pain{/d} that you have tried so desperately to forget.{/n} "Your body is broken and flawed, and your mind is bleeding. You should have given up long ago, fading one. Accept your death, and let go of your torment."
languages.original_text: {n}Шепоты вцепляются в самое болезненное воспоминание словно в оголенный нерв — дыхание перехватывает от воспоминания о {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}боли{/d}, которую вы так пытались забыть.{/n} "Твое тело поломано и ущербно, а разум кровоточит в муках. Ты сломан{mf||а}, калека. Тебе стоило сдаться еще давно. Прими смерть, избавься от страданий".

traits.locale_text: {n}The whispers sink their fangs into your most painful memory as if it were an exposed nerve, and it knocks the air out of your lungs as you remember the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}pain{/d} that you have tried so desperately to forget.{/n} "Your body is broken and flawed, and your mind is bleeding. You should have given up long ago, fading cripple. Accept your death, and let go of your torment."

You should have given up long ago, fading cripple. Accept your death, and let go of your torment."

languages.text: {n}Das Flüstern bohrt seine Zähne in deine schmerzhafteste Erinnerung, als wäre sie ein freiliegender Nerv. Es presst die Luft aus deinen Lungen, als du dich an den {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}Schmerz{/d} erinnerst, den du so verzweifelt vergessen wolltest.{/n} "Euer Körper ist gebrochen und geschunden, Euer Verstand blutet. Ihr hättet schon vor langer Zeit aufgeben sollen. Akzeptiert Euren Tod und lasst Eure Qualen los."
languages.original_text: {n}The whispers sink their fangs into your most painful memory as into an exposed nerve. It knocks the air out of your lungs as you remember the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}pain{/d} that you have tried so desperately to forget.{/n} "Your body is broken and flawed, and your mind is bleeding. You should have given up long ago, fading one. Accept your death, and let go of your torment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Flüstern bohrt seine Zähne in deine schmerzhafteste Erinnerung, als wäre sie ein freiliegender Nerv. Es presst die Luft aus deinen Lungen, als du dich an den {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}Schmerz{/d} erinnerst, den du so verzweifelt vergessen wolltest.{/n} "Euer Körper ist gebrochen und geschunden, Euer Verstand blutet. Ihr hättet schon vor langer Zeit aufgeben sollen. Akzeptiert Euren Tod und lasst Eure Qualen los."

languages.text: {n}Les murmures plantent leurs crocs dans votre souvenir le plus douloureux comme dans un nerf à vif. Vous êtes {mf|estomaqué|estomaquée} par la {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}douleur{/d} que vous avez si désespérément tenté d'oublier.{/n} « Votre corps est brisé et informe, et votre esprit saigne. Vous auriez dû abandonner depuis bien longtemps. Acceptez votre mort et libérez-vous de vos tourments. »
languages.original_text: {n}The whispers sink their fangs into your most painful memory as into an exposed nerve. It knocks the air out of your lungs as you remember the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}pain{/d} that you have tried so desperately to forget.{/n} "Your body is broken and flawed, and your mind is bleeding. You should have given up long ago, fading one. Accept your death, and let go of your torment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les murmures plantent leurs crocs dans votre souvenir le plus douloureux comme dans un nerf à vif. Vous êtes {mf|estomaqué|estomaquée} par la {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}douleur{/d} que vous avez si désespérément tenté d'oublier.{/n} « Votre corps est brisé et informe, et votre esprit saigne. Vous auriez dû abandonner depuis bien longtemps. Acceptez votre mort et libérez-vous de vos tourments. »

languages.text: {n}Los susurros clavan sus colmillos en tu recuerdo más doloroso como si fuera un nervio expuesto. Al recordar el {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}dolor{/d} que llevas tanto tiempo intentando olvidar desesperadamente, el aire abandona tus pulmones.{/n} «Tu cuerpo está quebrantado, es falible, y tu mente sangra. Deberías haber abandonado hace mucho, efímer{mf|o|a}. Acepta tu muerte y deja atrás el tormento».
languages.original_text: {n}The whispers sink their fangs into your most painful memory as into an exposed nerve. It knocks the air out of your lungs as you remember the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}pain{/d} that you have tried so desperately to forget.{/n} "Your body is broken and flawed, and your mind is bleeding. You should have given up long ago, fading one. Accept your death, and let go of your torment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los susurros clavan sus colmillos en tu recuerdo más doloroso como si fuera un nervio expuesto. Al recordar el {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}dolor{/d} que llevas tanto tiempo intentando olvidar desesperadamente, el aire abandona tus pulmones.{/n} «Tu cuerpo está quebrantado, es falible, y tu mente sangra. Deberías haber abandonado hace mucho, tullid{mf|o|a} vetust{mf|o|a}. Acepta tu muerte y deja atrás el tormento».

languages.text: {n}その囁きは、むき出しの神経だけでなくあなたの一番つらい記憶に牙を食い込ませる。必死に忘れようとしていた{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}痛み{/d}を思い出さされ、肺から空気が抜ける。{/n}「あなたの体は壊れていて、欠陥があって、心は血を流している。もう何年も前にさっさと諦めておくべきだったのに、消えゆく者よ。死を受け入れて、苦しみを手放しなさい」
languages.original_text: {n}The whispers sink their fangs into your most painful memory as into an exposed nerve. It knocks the air out of your lungs as you remember the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}pain{/d} that you have tried so desperately to forget.{/n} "Your body is broken and flawed, and your mind is bleeding. You should have given up long ago, fading one. Accept your death, and let go of your torment."

traits.locale_text: {n}その囁きは、むき出しの神経だけでなくあなたの一番つらい記憶に牙を食い込ませる。必死に忘れようとしていた{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}痛み{/d}を思い出さされ、肺から空気が抜ける。「あなたの体は壊れていて、欠陥があって、心は血を流している。もう何年も前に、衰え、廃人となって、さっさと諦めておくべきだったのに。死を受け入れて、苦しみを手放しなさい」{/n}

languages.text: {n}那些窃窃私语的声音将毒牙刺入你最痛苦的记忆之中，仿佛在啮咬着暴露在外的神经一样。你想起来了那些你拼命试图忘记的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}痛苦{/d}，你感觉肺里的空气都被挤走了。{/n}“你的身体满是缺陷，支离破碎，你的意识鲜血淋漓。你早就该放弃了，病入膏肓之人。接受你的死亡，放下你的痛苦吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}The whispers sink their fangs into your most painful memory as into an exposed nerve. It knocks the air out of your lungs as you remember the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}pain{/d} that you have tried so desperately to forget.{/n} "Your body is broken and flawed, and your mind is bleeding. You should have given up long ago, fading one. Accept your death, and let go of your torment."

traits.locale_text: {n}那些窃窃私语的声音将毒牙刺入你最痛苦的记忆之中，仿佛在啮咬着暴露在外的神经一样。你想起来了那些你拼命试图忘记的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}痛苦{/d}，你感觉肺里的空气都被挤走了。{/n}“你的身体满是缺陷，支离破碎，你的意识鲜血淋漓。你早就该放弃了，病入膏肓的废人。接受你的死亡，放下你的痛苦吧。”

languages.text: {n}Fısıltılar, dişlerini açıktaki bir sinire batırır gibi en acı hatıralarına saplıyor. Unutmak için umutsuzca çabaladığın {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}acıları{/d} hatırladıkça ciğerlerindeki hava dışarı savruluyor.{/n} "Vücudun çökük ve kusurlu, zihnin ise kan kaybediyor. Uzun zaman önce pes etmeliydin soluk derili. Ölümünü kabul eyle, bu işkence bir son ver."
languages.original_text: {n}The whispers sink their fangs into your most painful memory as into an exposed nerve. It knocks the air out of your lungs as you remember the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}pain{/d} that you have tried so desperately to forget.{/n} "Your body is broken and flawed, and your mind is bleeding. You should have given up long ago, fading one. Accept your death, and let go of your torment."
